entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
